content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Your personal information is stored by the Company and/or our service providers, strictly to the extent necessary for the performance of our obligations and only for the time necessary to achieve the purposes for which the information is collected, in accordance with applicable law. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Your personal data will be retained for a maximum of 10 (ten) years after the termination of your employment, unless a different period is established by law or regulation for a specific processing, without prejudice to this period being extended to the duration of any legal proceedings.
